summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a business matter related to J.P. Morgan Asset Management. Staley is seeking direction from Epstein regarding a partnership or collaboration.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding a business matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is responding to Jes Staley's inquiry about a partnership with J.P. Morgan Asset Management.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are discussing a potential business partnership involving J.P. Morgan Asset Management.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on July 24, 2009.
Jes Staley is seeking direction from Jeffrey Epstein regarding a partnership with J.P. Morgan Asset Management.
Jeffrey Epstein uses the email address jeevacation@gmail.com.
The document contains a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
